data.text: @nzherald Life. Life comes back. You scaremongering critters. Get back to living.
@nzherald Ask the Government as that is your only source of true information. Perhaps another “Grant” will ease you into the right attitude.
@nzherald "Eventually we will be so full of vaccine that we will live forever and be indestructible"

@nzherald You have contributed to the violence we saw yesterday. You've been pushing these absurdities and dishonest, pro-state takes for months if not years now.

I don't believe you. https://t.co/fnA9rUbOTz

@nzherald The new variant is extremely infectious. Use app Bost instead to safely communicate at social distance. Download for free at Apple https://t.co/uChWynVbJG & Google https://t.co/Nvi0yitq3f https://t.co/y4aQTP86QM
